General.Name: Ecolomondo Corp
General.Description: Ecolomondo Corporation operates as a clean tech company in Canada. It focuses on commercialization and implementation of thermal decomposition process using a pyrolysis platform that converts hydrocarbon waste into marketable commodity end-products, including carbon black substitute, oil, gas, and steel. The company is headquartered in Saint-Laurent, Canada.
General.Address: 3435 Pitfield Blvd, Saint-Laurent, QC, Canada, H4S 1H7

3.Name: Mr. Krishna  Mynampati
